name: LaGold: Handmade Gown with 14 Carat Gold Beads
description:
LaGold is a Body Jewelry for special occasion, party or for entertainers: Singers, Dancers, Movie Stars, etc. LaGold is an all hand beaded Haute Couture Dress made with 14 Carat Gold beads and strong jewelry threads.

This one-of-a-kind piece of art work required 840 hours to make and is made-to-measure to the exact size of the Buyer. The length of the straps at the bottom can be adjusted to meet Buyer's request. The price listed covers sizes between 4 and 10. Price estimation will be provided for sizes above 10.

Designer/Seller will travel nationwide in the US, paying trip expenses and personally providing fitting and size adjustment. Also, LaGold will be hand-delivered in person (with final fitting if necessary) by Designer/Seller. If Buyer does not reside in the US and cannot travel to meet Designer/Seller in the US, arrangement will be made with date and location for fitting and delivering.

LaGold can only be produced in a very limited quantity.

Please, allow 4 to 5 months (840 hours) for completion.

(LaGold is a Gisèle Gomez Creation)

options.name: Lara - Acrylic Beads in all colors

name: Bibiana - Handmade Flaminco Blouse With Red Beads
description:
Handmade with acrylic beads and Strong jewelry tread. Bibiana closes at the back with 4 handmade buttons.

Bibiana is a made-to-measure outfit and can be worn with short skirt (as shown on the pictures) or long ones, pants or sexy mini shorts.

You may have it made in 14 Carat Gold or Silver *metallic beads, or any color of your choice of acrylic beads picked on our color chart.

*The price is $2400.00 when Bibiana is made with 14 Carat Gold beads or with 14 Carat Silver beads.

The prices listed cover sizes between 4 and 10. Price estimation will be provided for sizes above 10.

Bibiana will be shipped to you fully insured with signature confirmation. Please, allow 3 to 4 weeks (before shipping) for completion.


(Bibiana is a Gisèle Gomez Creation)

categories.name: Tops: Bra, Tank, Blouse, Jacket, Tunic, Vest

name: Xena and Anabelle, Handmade Bikini or Lingerie in Beads
description:
Xena (top) and Anabelle (bottom) are two pieces of body-jewelry handmade with acrylic beads. You may wear them as a swimsuit to show off on the beach or for a pool party, also as lingerie under a shear “nuisette” or "deshabille" for a romantic occasion.

Each of these two pieces is made-to-measure and can be worn with a different style of top/bottom. They can be ordered separately and in any color of your choice picked on our of acrylic beads color chart.


>>> Xena (top) is a “bandeau” style bras and cost $199.00 when purchased alone. It can be worn on a pair of Jean, sexy short or mini skirt. It closes at the back with 3 buttons and requires 5 to 7 days (before shipping) to be completed.

>>> Anabelle (bottom) is a Tong with a T-back and cost $259.00 when purchased alone. For your protection, the beading system is made very tight (no see-through) to cover the crotch area. It closes on the left hand side with one button and requires 6 to 8 days (before shipping) to be completed.

Xena and/or Anabelle will be shipped to you fully insured with signature confirmation. They cost $419.00 when ordered together. Also, the shipping price is the same when you order Xena alone, Anabelle alone or both together. For instance, the cost is $9.80 (USA Domestic) or $38.95 (International) to ship Xena alone, Anabelle alone or both together in a single box. We buy Insurance with signature confirmation ourselves for all orders shipped.

When purchasing both together please, allow 12 to 15 days (before shipping) for completion.



(Xena (top) and Anabelle (bottom) are Gisèle Gomez Creations)

name: Rochelle, a Handmade Mini-Skirt in Beads
description:
Rochelle is a Mini Skirt handmade with acrylic beads. It can be worn as a “Pareo” to cover your Bikini when walking on the beach, sitting at a Café or Restaurant, or dancing at a Party.

Rochelle is made-to-measure and can be worn with different style of our Bikini tops in beads. Also it looks very sexy when worn with a large T-shirt, a long sleeve jacket or a tunic. It can be ordered in any color of your choice picked on our of acrylic beads color chart. It closes at the front with 3 buttons.

>>> The Rochelle mini skirt sold alone cost $499.00 and requires 8 to 10 days (before shipping) for completion. You may purchase it along with our two-piece Bikini Xena and Anabelle, or wear it with your own Bikini/Swimsuit.


>>> Xena (top) is a “bandeau” style bra and it cost $199.00 when purchased alone. It can be worn on a pair of Jeans, sexy short or mini skirt. It closes at the back with 3 buttons and requires 5 to 7 days (before shipping) to be completed.

>>> Anabelle (bottom) is a Tong with a T-back and cost $259.00 when purchased alone. For your protection, the beading system is made very tight (no see-through) to cover the crotch area. It closes on the left hand side with one button and requires 6 to 8 days (before shipping) to be completed.


Xena, Rochelle and/or Anabelle will be shipped to you fully insured with signature confirmation. They cost $879.00 when ordered all 3 together. Also, the shipping price is the same when you order Xena alone, Rochelle alone, Anabelle alone or all 3 together. For instance, the cost is $9.80 (USA Domestic) or $38.95 (International) to ship Xena alone, Rochelle alone, Anabelle alone or all 3 together in a single box.

When purchasing the 3 pieces together please, allow 3 to 4 weeks (before shipping) for completion. We buy Insurance with signature confirmation ourselves for all orders shipped.


(Rochelle is a Gisèle Gomez Creation)
